item.title: 战神称渴望套现的私募股权投资者面临漫长等待
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）收购业务主管表示，由于全球贸易动荡削弱了交易复苏的希望，私募股权投资者将不得不等待更长的时间才能从老基金中取回资金。【原文：Private equity investors will have to wait even longer before getting back their money back from older funds as global trade turmoil dims hopes of a deal revival, according to the head of Ares Management Corp.’s buyout business.】

item.title: 热门聊天机器人排名网站正在成为一家真正的公司

item.title: 如果贸易谈判失败，欧盟将考虑对美国实施出口限制
item.description: 欧盟正在制定一项提案，对部分出口到美国的产品实施限制，作为对唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月发起的扩张性贸易战的一种可能的报复策略。【原文：The European Union is working on a proposal to introduce restrictions on some exports to the US as a possible retaliatory tactic in the expansive trade war President Donald Trump initiated last month.】

item.title: 日间交易者拒绝放弃最爱的痴迷：杠杆基金
item.description: 惩罚性的股票抛售和飙升的波动性无法让投资者远离市场风险最大的角落之一：杠杆式交易所交易基金。【原文：A punishing stock selloff and soaring volatility couldn’t keep investors away from one of the market’s riskiest corners: leveraged exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: Blackstone 将于五月推出面向日常投资者的信贷基金
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 面向个人的新信贷基金将于 5 月 1 日首次亮相，在公共市场动荡不安的时期，这将考验投资者是否愿意在债券之外涉足另类投资。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s new credit fund for individuals is set to debut on May 1, testing investors’ appetite to venture beyond bonds into alternatives in a volatile time for public markets.】

item.title: SPAC 将利用 IPO 冻结的机会，爆发 10 亿美元交易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税战重创了股票和债券，并关闭了传统的首次公开募股市场。然而，即使风险偏好受到抑制，最有可能从剧烈波动中获益的领域也是投机性最强的领域之一：SPAC 市场。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff war has hammered stocks and bonds, and shuttered the traditional IPO market. Yet even with risk appetite on hold, the area that could benefit most from the rampant volatility is among the most speculative: The SPAC market.】

item.title: 圣马可集团在巴西提出法外追偿计划

item.title: Pimco和T. Rowe利用美国证券交易委员会的转变推动节税基金的发展
item.description: 一种改变游戏规则的基金设计很快将获得美国证券监管机构的批准，这种设计将帮助资产管理公司减少客户的税费支出，并扩大 ETF 业务。【原文：Optimism is building that a game-changing fund design that will help asset managers shrink clients’ tax bills and grow their ETF businesses will soon be approved by the US securities regulator.】

item.title: 特朗普关税如何威胁美国服装价格上涨？
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动的贸易战中，那些为美国人提供服装和鞋子的国家和企业受到的影响最大。【原文：Among the countries and businesses with the most at stake in the trade war unleashed by US President Donald Trump are those that supply Americans with their clothing and shoes.】

item.title: 惠誉上调博士伦和博士健康评级，但维持两者为 "垃圾 "级

item.title: ETF 在通常平静的市场中是一把双刃剑
item.description: 本月，在 ETF 的推动下，市政债券出现了恐慌性抛售，这对投资者来说是喜忧参半。【原文：This month’s panic-driven selling across municipal bonds — fueled by the boom in ETFs — is proving a mixed blessing for investors in a normally sedate market corner.】

item.title: 中国茶叶连锁店首次公开募股不惧波动，美国股价上涨 43
item.description: 中国茶叶连锁店茶叶控股有限公司在美国首次公开发行股票，募集到 4.11 亿美元资金，一改贸易战动荡不安的市场局面，股价在上市首日攀升 43%。【原文：Shares of Chagee Holdings Ltd. climbed as much as 43% in their debut session after the Chinese tea chain raised $411 million in its US initial public offering, defying a market besieged by trade-war volatility.】

item.title: 财政部与美联储和联邦存款保险公司合作简化银行监管程序
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）正在主持与美联储和其他银行机构的非公开会议，他将在简化监管和协调放松监管计划方面发挥更大的作用。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is hosting private meetings with the Federal Reserve and other bank agencies as he takes a bigger role in streamlining oversight and coordinating plans to ease regulation.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克认为经济和利率存在广泛可能性
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策及其对经济的影响存在不确定性，她对利率走向保持开放态度。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said she’s keeping an open mind about the direction of interest rates because of uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s policies and how they will affect the economy.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司在石油价格下滑和政府压力下下调燃油价格
item.description: 近期全球石油市场低迷，巴西国家控制的石油生产商巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）在要求降低柴油价格的政治压力下，本月第二次降低柴油价格。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petroleo Brasileiro SA is reducing diesel prices for the second time this month after a recent downturn in the global oil market and amid political pressure for price relief at the pump.】

item.title: 石油暴跌和英镑走强将抑制英国通胀率上升
item.description: 能源价格和美元因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战而暴跌，将抑制英国通胀率的回升，英国通胀率的回升使英国央行对降息保持紧张。【原文：A resurgence in UK inflation that has kept the Bank of England nervous about cutting interest rates is set to be curbed by energy prices and the dollar tumbling in response to US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 重要矿产股票因特朗普支持该行业的迹象而反弹
item.description: 本周，美国重要矿产类股飙升，有迹象表明特朗普政府将青睐这个已成为中美贸易对峙热点的行业。【原文：US critical minerals stocks have soared this week, getting a boost from signs that the Trump administration will favor a sector that’s become a flashpoint in the trade standoff between the US and China.】

item.title: 德国技术租赁公司 Grover 即将在法庭上达成重组协议

item.title: 航运数据可能显示货物被转运至英国的迹象
item.description: 据经济学家称，在中国出口商发出倾销警告之际，航运数据可能显示出曾经运往美国的货物被转运至英国市场的早期迹象。【原文：Shipping data may be showing early signs of goods once destined for the US being redirected to the UK market amid warnings of dumping by Chinese exporters, according to economists.】

item.title: 美国房产税增长放缓，但更多郡突破 10,000 美元
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，与 2023 年相比，美国房主去年的房产税增长速度有所放缓，而平均税额超过 1 万美元的县的数量继续稳步增长。【原文：US homeowners saw their property taxes rise more slowly last year compared with 2023, while the number of counties where the average bill tops $10,000 continued its steady increase, according to a new study.】

item.title: 丹麦降息与欧洲央行看齐，克朗下滑考验基准利率
